author: kkolinko
msg: Fix download task check for commons-pool and commons-dbcp.
Without this patch the 'ant download' call does not download
the updated commons-pool or commons-dbcp version,
like the recent update of commons-pool 1.4 -> 1.5.1,
unless you run 'ant clean-depend' or delete existing ${tomcat-dbcp.jar} file before that.
